title: Sajjan Jindal looks to recreate iconic 'Maruti Moment' with JSW MG India
description: JSW MG, led by Jindal, targets selling a million NEVs by 2030 with Mumbai announcement. Plans include SAIC deal, Odisha investment, and focus on green mobility amidst geopolitical tensions, Hector, Astor models.
